abilities.name: Mitosis
abilities.info: Your space docks cannot produce infantry.  At the start of the status phase , place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on any planet you control.

promissory_note.name: Stymie
promissory_note.info: ACTION: Place this card face up in your play area. While this card is in your play area, the Arborec player cannot produce units in or adjacent to non-home systems that contain 1 or more of your units. If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Arborec player's units, return this card to the Arborec player.

technologies.name: Bioplasmosis
technologies.info: At the end of the status phase , you may remove any number of infantry from planets you control and place them on 1 or more planets you control in the same or adjacent systems. Requirements: 2 Green

unit_upgrades.name: Letani Warrior II
abilities: After this unit is destroyed, roll 1 die.  If the result is 6 or greater, place the unit on this card.  At the start of your next turn, place each unit that is on this card on a planet you control in your home system.

flagship.name: Duha Menaimon
abilities: After you activate this system, you may produce up to 5 units in this system

quote: Do you hear, flesh-thing? The harmonies of the Arborec? Your golems of metal and noise and fire have deafened you to the symphony.
